Metadata Standard: DDI - Data Documentation Initiative (out of scope)
FGDC/CSDGM - Federal Geographic Data Committee Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
ABCD - Access to Biological Collection Data
OAI-ORE - Open Archives Initiative Object Reuse and Exchange
MIBBI - Minimum Information for Biological and Biomedical Investigations (deprecated)
SDMX - Statistical Data and Metadata Exchange, SDMX in a nutshell: https://sdmx.org/wp-content/uploads/ecb-tutorial.html, example from OECD: https://data.oecd.org/fr/api/sdmx-json-documentation/
International Virtual Observatory Alliance Technical Specifications (out of cope)

Elements: three core entities: agent, entity and activity

Metadata Standard: AVM - Astronomy Visualization Metadata (out of scope)
CIF - Crystallographic Information Framework (file format, out of scope)
PDBx/mmCIF (Protein Data Bank Exchange Dictionary and the Macromolecular Crystallographic Information Framework)
Domain: 3D structures of proteins, nucleic acids, and complex assemblies
Semantic Support: partly (e.g., NCBI ID, enriched/linked with GO processes)

Metadata Standard: Protocol Data Element Definitions (out of scope)
Domain: no metadata standard, data elements required for submitting clinical trials to  CLincalTrials.gov

Mandatory Elements: 24 (minOccur=0 for 63 elements out of 87 --> 63 are optional)
Semantic Support: Partly (URI of controlled vocabularies recommended but not mandatory), provision of controlled vocabulary list: http://onto.nerc.ac.uk/EF/codelist

Elements: abstract model, 3 core entities: Templates, TemplateElement, TemplateField

Metadata Standard: FITS (file format in astronomy, out of scope)

Examples: INSPIRE (Infrastructure for Spatial Information in Europe)
